document.title: Snakes Versus Cows: A Balanced View

page.title: Colour
page.paragraph: Snakes and cows are both creatures that come in a variety of colours.
Snakes have the most colours and are therefore the best.
page.note: Remember the 3C rule: Cows aren't Colourful enough to Consider

page.title: Number of Legs
page.paragraph: Regarding leg number, cows are the clear winner with a lead of around 4.0 legs!

page.title: Process of Milking
page.paragraph: On this issue, the two sides are perfectly balanced.
